projects.title: Blackjack React App
description: Blackjack card game built in React, using TypeScript
All application state is managed with React Hooks
Featured in the August 29th, 2019 issue of the React.js Newsletter by Tyler McGinnis: http://reactjsnewsletter.com/issues/175#projects

projects.title: Project Automation
description: Python script for creating new projects in the desired local directory, with a GitHub origin
Open sourced project with multiple contributors
